## Usage
‚ö†Ô∏è [Git](https://git-scm.com/downloads), [Python](https://www.python.org/), and [Docker-compose](https://docs.docker.com/compose/install/) must be installed and accessible ‚ö†Ô∏è

```bash
python3 -m pip install fastapi_template
fastapi_template
# Answer prompts questions
# ???
# üç™ Enjoy your new project üç™
cd new_project
docker-compose up --build
```

## Features
Currently supported features:
- redis
- systemd units
- Example (dummy) SQLAlchemy model
- Elastic Search support
- Scheduler support
